name: electricity production, photovoltaic, 3kWp facade installation, multi-Si, panel, mounted | electricity, low voltage | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1458/documentation

This dataset represents the production of grid-connected low voltage electricity with a 3 kWp building integrated photovoltaic (PV) module worldwide in 2011 as an extrapolation from Switzerland.. The 3 kWp module has been chosen as basic module for building integrated PV electricity production. Larger modules can easily be built with these 3 kWp modules without producing a significant error in environmental impact calculations. The module is a multi-Si panel installed at a façade.;An inverter is used to convert the low voltage DC power into AC power. ;An average yield of 1099 kWh/kWp was assumed for the calculations including a façade factor. 

From the PV module installed and ready to be used. 

This activity ends with low voltage electricity produced with the 3 kWp module, assuming an average yield. 

This dataset includes tap water use for cleaning the module and it’s treatment.
category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/351:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution/3510:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Electricity production with a grid-connected 3 kWp multi-Si photovoltaic panel mounted on a building façade. See field "extrapolation" for comment on the output voltage.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The simplifying assumption was made that all electricity is directly provided as low voltage electricity, so that no transformation has to take place. Even in countries with high shares of open ground installations (where medium or high voltage electricity might arrive at the busbar), the mistake due to this assumption is not significant, as transformation processes do only have a low influence on environmental impacts.

flow.name: electricity, low voltage
flow.category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/351:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution/3510:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution

exchanges.description:
EcoSpold01Location=CH
Calculated value. Amount of installation needed to produce 1 kWh * panel area per installation * water need to clean 1 m2 of panel. [unit/kWh * m2/unit * l/m2 = l/kWh]. A density of 1 kg/dm3 is assumed.
